video.title: Specchio Italian restaurant miami beach surfside review by John Lieberman Business coach
video.description:
Business Coach John Lieberman reviews Specchio Italian Restaurant Miami Beach Surfside as a business power dining bistro. John talks about the service, authentic Italian food cuisine, appetizers, entres, salads, wines and the desserts the chef specializes in. John has been a power diner who has traveled the world and used to eat at Specchio's Cafe when it was located in New York.
Now Gianni's place is at 9485 Harding Avenue Surfside Miami Beach Florida 33154.Business dining review. see more at www.johnlieberman.com

comment.text: Great place for a business lunch.
